name: Castle Nightmare
overview: In an old chest is a rough, precious diamond. Join Simon, the hero of Castle Nightmare, through 10 levels. Open the chest, grab the diamond, and free Simon from the prison. But it is a long and dangerous way to freedom. You can find the key of every room and put it in the closing hole that appears on it. A secret opens and you step into an even scarier room. Beware of the hangman who guards the key, bats who yearn for your life, ghosts that block your way! Use your intellect, so that you choose the right course and do not run against an invisible wall button on the lamp that lights you the way out of the dark room Huge monsters, of which you only see the eyes, threaten you. And hurry, because time is running away ...
